content:
<rule id="security-manager-deprecation-00050" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
            	<javaclass references="java.util.logging.LogManager.checkAccess({*})"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="5" title="java.util.logging.LogManager.checkAccess method has been deprecated">
                    <message>
                        The java.util.logging.LogManager::checkAccess method has been deprecated in Java 17. 
                        See the link for further information.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/411" title="JEP 411: Deprecate the Security Manager for Removal"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
